statements: SELECT * FROM movies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, birth_date FROM actors WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM actors;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT name FROM actors WHERE birth_date < '1995-01-01';
SELECT title AS MovieTitle, name AS ActorName FROM movies INNER JOIN actors ON movies.id = actors.id;
SELECT * FROM actors ORDER BY birth_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_year FROM movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
SELECT name, age FROM actors JOIN movies ON actors.movie_id = movies.movie_id ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year < 1990 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT a.name, a.age, m.title FROM actors a JOIN movies m ON a.movie_id = m.movie_id WHERE a.age > 30 ORDER BY m.title ASC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT title AS movie_title, release_year AS year_released FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY year_released DESC, movie_title ASC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE dob < '1980-01-01';
SELECT movie_id, title FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM movie_cast WHERE movie_id = 1 AND actor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, first_name, last_name FROM movies JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id JOIN actors ON movie_cast.actor_id = actors.actor_id;
SELECT title, COUNT(*) AS total_cast FROM movies JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id GROUP BY title;

SELECT movies.title, actors.first_name AS actor_first_name, actors.last_name AS actor_last_name FROM movies JOIN movie_cast ON movies.movie_id = movie_cast.movie_id JOIN actors ON movie_cast.actor_id = actors.actor_id ORDER BY movies.title ASC, actors.last_name DESC;
SELECT id, title, release_date FROM movies
SELECT name, birthdate FROM actors
SELECT movie_id, actor_id, role FROM movie_actors
SELECT movie_id, rating FROM movie_ratings
SELECT * FROM movies
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT movies.title, actors.name FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_actors ON movies.id = movie_actors.movie_id INNER JOIN actors ON movie_actors.actor_id = actors.id;
SELECT title, rating FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_ratings ON movies.id = movie_ratings.movie_id WHERE rating > 7.5;

SELECT movies.title, actors.name, movie_actors.role FROM movies INNER JOIN movie_actors ON movies.id = movie_actors.movie_id INNER JOIN actors ON movie_actors.actor_id = actors.id WHERE role = 'Lead Actor';
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT name, dob FROM actors WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT movies.title, actors.name FROM movies JOIN movie_actors ON movies.movie_id = movie_actors.movie_id JOIN actors ON movie_actors.actor_id = actors.actor_id;
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE release_date > '2000-01-01' AND release_date < '2010-01-01';
SELECT movies.title, genres.genre_name FROM movies JOIN movie_genres ON movies.movie_id = movie_genres.movie_id JOIN genres ON movie_genres.genre_id = genres.genre_id ORDER BY genres.genre_name DESC;
